languages.text: "При первом визите на Салис Прайм я и не подозревал, какое сокровище скрывается под его снегами. Сестра, вы явили Простору истинное чудо веры".
"On my first visit to Salis Prime, I had no idea what treasure lay beneath its snowy surface. Sister, you have shown the Expanse a true miracle of faith."
languages.original_text: "При первом визите на Салис Прайм я и не подозревал, какое сокровище скрывается под его снегами. Сестра, вы явили Простору истинное чудо веры".

traits.locale_text: "On my first visit to Salis Prime, I had no idea what treasure lay beneath its snowy surface. Sister, you have shown the Expanse a true miracle of faith."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "On my first visit to Salis Prime, I had no idea what treasure lay beneath its snowy surface. Sister, you have shown the Expanse a true miracle of faith."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "On my first visit to Salis Prime, I had no idea what treasure lay beneath its snowy surface. Sister, you have shown the Expanse a true miracle of faith."

traits.locale_text: "On my first visit to Salis Prime, I had no idea what treasure lay beneath its snowy surface. Sister, you have shown the Expanse a true miracle of faith."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “当我第一次去萨利斯主星时，我根本没有察觉到积雪之下藏着什么宝藏。你让整个科罗努斯扩区看到了信仰带来的奇迹，修女。”
languages.original_text: "On my first visit to Salis Prime, I had no idea what treasure lay beneath its snowy surface. Sister, you have shown the Expanse a true miracle of faith."

traits.locale_text: “当我第一次去萨利斯主星时，我根本没有察觉到积雪之下藏着什么宝藏。你让整个科罗努斯扩区看到了信仰带来的奇迹，修女。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Si on m'avait dit qu'un trésor reposait sous la neige de Salis Primus la première fois que j'y suis venu, je n'y aurais pas cru. Ma sœur, ce que vous avez accompli tient du miracle. »
languages.original_text: "On my first visit to Salis Prime, I had no idea what treasure lay beneath its snowy surface. Sister, you have shown the Expanse a true miracle of faith."

traits.locale_text: « Si on m'avait dit qu'un trésor reposait sous la neige de Salis Primus la première fois que j'y suis venu, je n'y aurais pas cru. Ma sœur, ce que vous avez accompli tient du miracle. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «En mi primera visita a Salis Prime, no sabía el tesoro que su superficie nevada ocultaba, hermana. Ha traído a la Extensión un verdadero milagro con su fe».
languages.original_text: "On my first visit to Salis Prime, I had no idea what treasure lay beneath its snowy surface. Sister, you have shown the Expanse a true miracle of faith."

traits.locale_text: «En mi primera visita a Salis Prime, no sabía el tesoro que su superficie nevada ocultaba, hermana. Ha traído a la Extensión un verdadero milagro con su fe».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「初めてサリス・プライムを訪れたとき、その雪面の下にどんな宝が眠っているのか見当もつきませんでした。シスター、あなたがエクスパンスに真の信仰の奇跡を見せてくれたのです」
languages.original_text: "On my first visit to Salis Prime, I had no idea what treasure lay beneath its snowy surface. Sister, you have shown the Expanse a true miracle of faith."

traits.locale_text: 「初めてサリス・プライムを訪れたとき、その雪面の下にどんな宝が眠っているのか見当もつきませんでした。シスター、あなたがエクスパンスに真の信仰の奇跡を見せてくれたのです」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Bei meinem ersten Besuch auf Salis Prime hatte ich keinen Schimmer, welche Schätze unter der verschneiten Oberfläche liegen. Schwester, Ihr habt der Ausdehnung ein wahres Wunder des Glaubens gezeigt."
languages.original_text: "On my first visit to Salis Prime, I had no idea what treasure lay beneath its snowy surface. Sister, you have shown the Expanse a true miracle of faith."

traits.locale_text: "Bei meinem ersten Besuch auf Salis Prime hatte ich keinen Schimmer, welche Schätze unter der verschneiten Oberfläche liegen. Schwester, Ihr habt der Ausdehnung ein wahres Wunder des Glaubens gezeigt."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "On my first visit to Salis Prime, I had no idea what treasure lay beneath its snowy surface. Sister, you have shown the Expanse a true miracle of faith."

languages.text: "İlk Salis Prime ziyaretimde karlı yüzeyinin altında ne cevherler yattığını bilmiyordum. İnancın mucizesini tüm Enginlik'e gösterdin Rahibe."
languages.original_text: "On my first visit to Salis Prime, I had no idea what treasure lay beneath its snowy surface. Sister, you have shown the Expanse a true miracle of faith."

traits.locale_text: "İlk Salis Prime ziyaretimde karlı yüzeyinin altında ne cevherler yattığını bilmiyordum. Enginlik'e inancın mucizesini gösterdin Rahibe."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
